mapper.select: select * from ( select * from ( SELECT ins.fname,i.fname iname,w.fname wname,l.fwelder_id fwelder_id, SUM(fworktime)/60/60 weldtime,round(SUM(fworktime) / 60 / 60) roundTime,group_concat(DISTINCT(j.fid)) jidgather FROM tb_work l left join tb_welder w on l.fwelder_id = w.fwelder_no inner join tb_welded_junction j on l.fjunction_id = j.fwelded_junction_no inner join tb_insframework i on i.fid = l.fitemid inner join tb_insframework ins on ins.fid = i.fparent where fstarttime >= #{time} and fendtime <= date_sub(date_sub(#{time} ,interval -1 day),interval 0 minute) and j.fend_time is not null group by i.fid,fwelder_id )A group by fwelder_id )temp

select * from ( (SELECT SUM(fworktime) AS hous,ins.fname iname,i.fname fname,group_concat(distinct(j.fid)) jidgather,j.Fmaterial ,j.Fnext_material nextmaterial,j.fwall_thickness,j.fnextwall_thickness,j.fexternal_diameter,j.fnextExternal_diameter FROM tb_work l INNER JOIN tb_welded_junction j ON l.fjunction_id = j.fwelded_junction_no INNER JOIN tb_insframework i ON i.fid = l.fitemid INNER JOIN tb_insframework ins ON ins.fid = i.fparent WHERE j.fend_time is not null AND i.ftype =23 and fstarttime >= #{time} and fendtime <= date_sub(date_sub(#{time} ,interval -1 day),interval 0 minute) GROUP BY i.fid ) UNION ( SELECT 0 AS hous,ins.fname iname, i.fname,0 as jidgather,null as Fmaterial,null as nextmaterial,null as fwall_thickness,null as fnextwall_thickness,null as fexternal_diameter,null as fnextExternal_diameter FROM tb_insframework i INNER JOIN tb_insframework ins ON ins.fid = i.fparent WHERE i.fid NOT IN ( SELECT i.fid FROM tb_work l INNER JOIN tb_welded_junction j ON l.fjunction_id = j.fwelded_junction_no INNER JOIN tb_insframework i ON i.fid = l.fitemid WHERE j.fend_time is not null AND i.ftype =23 and fstarttime >= #{time} and fendtime <= date_sub(date_sub(#{time} ,interval -1 day),interval 0 minute) GROUP BY i.fid) AND i.ftype =23 GROUP BY i.fid ))temp

select * from ( select sum(num) overtime,fid,fname,iname,weldTime from ( select case when SUM(fstandbytime)/60 >= #{num} then 1 else 0 end as num,i.fid,ins.fname,i.fname iname, DATE_FORMAT( fstarttime, '%Y-%m-%d' ) weldTime from tb_standby l INNER JOIN tb_insframework i on i.fid = l.fitemid INNER JOIN tb_insframework ins ON ins.fid = i.fparent WHERE fstarttime >= #{time} and fendtime <= date_sub(date_sub(#{time} ,interval -1 day),interval 0 minute) group by fmachine_id ,weldTime ) A group by fid ,weldTime )temp

select * from (select sum(falarmtime) as overproof,DATE_FORMAT( fstarttime, '%Y-%m-%d' )weldtime ,ins.fname,i.fname iname,i.fid from tb_alarm l inner join tb_welded_junction j on j.fwelded_junction_no=l.fjunction_id inner join tb_insframework i on l.fitemid = i.fid inner join tb_insframework ins on ins.fid = i.fparent WHERE fstarttime >= #{time} and fendtime <= date_sub(date_sub(#{time} ,interval -1 day),interval 0 minute) group by fid,weldtime )temp

select * from ( select sum(fworktime) / ( 8 *60 *60 ) AS loads,DATE_FORMAT( fstarttime, '%Y-%m-%d') AS weldTime,i.fid iid,i.fname iname,ins.fname from tb_work l INNER JOIN tb_insframework i ON l.fitemid = i.fid INNER JOIN tb_insframework ins ON ins.fid = i.fparent WHERE fstarttime >= #{time} and fendtime <= date_sub(date_sub(#{time} ,interval -1 day),interval 0 minute) GROUP BY iid, weldTime )temp

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT SUM(fstandbytime) AS loads,DATE_FORMAT( fstarttime,'%Y-%m-%d') weldTime, ins.fname,i.fname iname, i.fid iid FROM tb_standby l INNER JOIN tb_insframework i ON l.fitemId = i.fid INNER JOIN tb_insframework ins ON ins.fid = i.fparent WHERE fstarttime >= #{time} and fendtime <= date_sub(date_sub(#{time} ,interval -1 day),interval 0 minute) GROUP BY iid, weldTime )temp

SELECT * FROM( SELECT count(mid) num,weldTime,fname,fid,iname from( SELECT m.fid mid,DATE_FORMAT( fstarttime, '%Y-%m-%d') weldTime ,ins.fname,i.fid,i.fname iname FROM tb_work l INNER JOIN tb_welding_machine m ON m.fid = l.fmachine_id INNER JOIN tb_insframework i ON i.fid = l.fitemid INNER JOIN tb_insframework ins on ins.fid = i.fparent WHERE fstarttime >= #{time} and fendtime <= date_sub(date_sub(#{time} ,interval -1 day),interval 0 minute) GROUP BY weldTime,fequipment_no UNION SELECT m.fid mid,DATE_FORMAT( fstarttime, '%Y-%m-%d') weldTime ,ins.fname,i.fid,i.fname iname FROM tb_standby l INNER JOIN tb_welding_machine m ON m.fid = l.fmachine_id INNER JOIN tb_insframework i ON i.fid = l.fitemid INNER JOIN tb_insframework ins on ins.fid = i.fparent WHERE fstarttime >= #{time} and fendtime <= date_sub(date_sub(#{time} ,interval -1 day),interval 0 minute) GROUP BY weldTime,fequipment_no )k group by weldTime,fid )temp

select * from( select ins.fname,i.fid iid,i.fname iname,e.fid eid,e.fname wname,d.fvaluename type,sum(fworktime)/60/60 time from tb_work l inner join tb_welding_machine w on w.fid = l.fmachine_id inner join tb_equipment_manufacturer e on w.fmanufacturer_id = e.fid inner join tb_dictionary d on d.fvalue = e.ftype inner join tb_insframework i on i.fid = w.finsframework_id inner join tb_insframework ins on ins.fid = i.fparent where fstarttime >= #{time} and fendtime <= date_sub(date_sub(#{time} ,interval -1 day),interval 0 minute) group by e.fid,e.ftype union select ins.fname,i.fid iid,i.fname iname,m.fid eid,m.fname wname,d.fvaluename type,0 time from tb_insframework i INNER JOIN tb_insframework ins on ins.fid = i.fparent, tb_equipment_manufacturer m inner join tb_dictionary d on d.fvalue = m.ftype WHERE i.ftype=23 and i.fid not in (select i.fid from tb_work l inner join tb_welding_machine w on w.fid = l.fmachine_id inner join tb_equipment_manufacturer e on w.fmanufacturer_id = e.fid inner join tb_insframework i on i.fid = w.finsframework_id inner join tb_insframework ins on ins.fid = i.fparent where fstarttime >= #{time} and fendtime <= date_sub(date_sub(#{time} ,interval -1 day),interval 0 minute) group by e.fid,e.ftype) )temp order by fname,wname desc
SELECT i.fid,i.fname,ins.fname iname from tb_insframework i inner join tb_insframework ins on ins.fid = i.fparent where i.ftype=23

SELECT COUNT(distinct(fmachine_id)) loads,DATE_FORMAT( fstarttime, '%Y-%m-%d' ) weldTime,i.fid FROM
tb_work
tb_standby l INNER JOIN tb_insframework i on i.fid = l.fitemid INNER JOIN tb_insframework ins ON ins.fid = i.fparent WHERE fstarttime >= #{time} and fendtime <= date_sub(date_sub(#{time} ,interval -1 day),interval 0 minute) group by weldTime,i.fid

SELECT count(w.fid) from tb_welding_machine w INNER JOIN tb_insframework i on i.fid = w.finsframework_id where 1=1
and i.fid=#{id}
